home.title: Campaigns
home.createOrEditLabel: Thêm mới hoặc cập nhật Campaign

campaign.created: Một Campaign mới được tạo với định danh {{ param }}
campaign.updated: Một Campaign cập nhật với định danh {{ param }}
campaign.deleted: Một Campaign đã xóa với định danh {{ param }}

delete.question: Bạn có chắc là muốn xóa Campaign {{ id }}?

campaign.name: Name

help.name: The name of the campaign
help.code: The code used to identify this campaign on report or CDR
help.externalId: External ID on other remote system
help.channel: The Channel to use for broadcasting, SMS / USSD
help.state: state code, 0 = Pending for Approval, 1 = Approved, 9 = Success, -9 = Expired
help.shortCode: The USSD shortcode used to send out messages
help.callbackUrl: Callback URL for VXML under USSD Network Browser
help.createdBy: Refer to User account which create this campaign
help.approvedBy: Refer to User account Who approve this campaign
help.shortMsg: First SMS or USSD messages to send to customers
help.msisdnList: List of MSISDN to be send
help.spSvc: Target Services to be broadcast related info, should be logged into CDR
help.subQuota: Total messages per subscriber allow to broadcast
help.rateLimit: SMS or USSD message broadcast per second
